title: Resolution Major Problem
body:
This issue happened three days ago. I have always played smoothly on my laptop before ( I know, trackpad... ) and my resolution for my laptop is 1920x1080 and it has been that way on league settings as always. Three days ago, my laptop froze in a game and I also noticed my fps caps at 60 now. (vsync for both in game and nvidia are off). 

I can only play when lowering the resolution and I cannot play on borderless or full screen anymore. I can only play on windowed and I cannot scroll down so basically I cannot play this game anymore. Does anyone know why when I pick 1920 x 1080 resolution for league, my fps caps at 60 and my screen will eventually freeze and I have to force shut down? Please I really need help

replies.body:
Are you running Windows 10? I've seen an increasing number of posts about similar issues after the recent Windows 10 Anniversary updates that rolled out a few days ago. If so, I recommend uninstalling those updates or [rolling back](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) to a previous build of windows before the recent updates.

If this is not the case, then I recommend working through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), which touches on the most common solutions for this issue.

Sorry for late reply, I was vacationing in another country, but yes, I did find a fix.

I have to run the program compatibility troubleshooter and revert to windows 7 or 8. I don't like this because I have to run it every time I open the client, but it does fix the resolution and freeze problem I am having. Guess I'll have to deal with this until another update rolls out.
